title: Fewatsu Help
data: Pages in Fewatsu are navigated using up [[up]], down [[down]], and the crank [[crank]].
To select links and images in a page, use right [[right]] and left [[left]]. You'll know if an element is selected when it has a border around it!
Selected links can be followed and selected images can be magnified with [[a]].
A side menu which usually contains more important pages is accessible using [[b]].
To exit Fewatsu, enter the side menu with [[b]] and select the *Exit...* option.
